question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.

In your letter

give contact details for when you are away
give instructions about how to care for your pet
describe other household duties
text: Thank you for taking care of the house and pet while I am away. I wanted to drop a note to let you know about some important details. I will be in Fort Myers this week staying at Courtyard Marriott gulf coast town centre. In case you need me , give a call at 998567853.

Tommy , my dog eats twice a day around 12:00 clock in the noon and 7:00 p.m in the afternoon and the dog food is present in the top most shelf of the kitchen. It would be very nice of you , if you can take him out for a walk every afternoon .Also please don't forget to cover him with clean sheets at night, otherwise he will catch a cold.

Secondly please don't forget to turn on the motion detectors when you leave the house and turn it off when you are back as a safety measure. Also the two plants beside the window need watering every alternate day.
Even though I will be back in 7 days it would be good if you can vacuum the house everyday as Tommy sheds a lot of hair which might trouble you.
Thanks again for all the help. See you soon

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
